oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Song book
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front cover identifies this item as a "Mitchell's School Atlas." Inside the front cover is featured two hand-written pages. At the bottom of the first page is a statement "Copyed for Cousin Molly Russell" Inside the book are newspaper clippings featuring songs and handwritten versions of lyrics with dates between 1863 and 1864. Book also includes a list of marriages, deaths, and other personal information.
